title: Buddha Jumps Over The Wall (Chinese Casserole)

ingredients.content: 12 oz pork short ribs, cut into pieces
14 oz Chinese cabbage, cut into pieces (1 in.)
5 oz bamboo shoot, fresh, cut into pieces
4 oz fresh black wood ear mushrooms, cut into pieces
5 garlic chives, cut into pieces (2 in.)
1 red chili pepper, stem removed, thinly sliced
fresh cilantro leaves, to garnish, to taste

preparations.content: Place pork ribs, rice wine, dried shrimp, garlic and sesame oil into mixing bowl and sauté <b>7 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.

Add dried mushrooms and chicken broth and cook <b>40 min/212°F//speed 1<b>. Add cabbage, bamboo shoots, wood ear mushrooms, gingko nuts, garlic chives, chili pepper, scallops, soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Place Varoma into position, add in quail eggs, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Remove Varoma and run eggs under cold water until they are cool enough to handle, carefully remove shells and discard. Serve soup hot, garnished with steamed quail eggs and cilantro.
